But those affected by your actions are not satisfied. Now, they are threatening to kill the one you love to exact revenge. And if you do not escape and reach the courthouse in 24 hours, she'll be gone. There are no other options. You must run.

name: Mega Man RPG: Prototype
description: Mega Man RPG Prototype is a browser-based fangame where you square off against hordes of increasingly challenging robot masters in turn-based battles, paying tribute to the battle systems of retro role-playing games released in the late 80s and early 90s. Prototype merges the combat and collection mechanics of the Pokémon series with the beloved characters and special weapons of the classic Mega Man series to create something familiar yet unexplored. The story unfolds in the original series timeline and features elements from across those games, but Battle Network fans may also recognize a familiar face or two. With three distinct campaigns, more than a hundred playable characters, and an ever-expanding array of unique abilities, there's a wealth of discovery awaiting in The Prototype.

name: Another Century's Episode Portable
description: Sin descripción

name: Alien Arena 2011
description:
This free standalone multiplayer deathmatch game has a retro sci-fi look to it. The game takes place in the distant future as a war rages between big-brained Martians and Robots. It uses the GNU General Public License of the id Tech 2 engine. There is also single player through the use of configurable bots. The first release featured 5 player characters, 10 levels, and 9 weapons (both of alien and human nature). It featured vertex lighting on models, textured particles, stainmaps, and hi-res full color textures and skins. The HUD shows player deaths and high scorer at all times. All source code was released with game. 
 
Version 2.0 added three brand new 1vs1 tourney levels, scripted shaders, quad and invulnerability shell effect added on weapon model and glass effects (helmets, tubes, etc) and intermission sequences were improved.

name: NewU Fitness First Mind Body, Yoga & Pilates Workout
description: NewU Fitness First Mind Body addresses the needs of your mind and your body with the Yoga and Pilates workout using a range of breathing and relaxation techniques. It will include a full and customisable program of exercises demonstrated by real personal trainers through videos and audio voiceover.

name: Bloodline Champions
description:
"Bloodline Champions is a competitive online multiplayer game for up to ten players per game, in which two teams fight for dominance.

Each player can choose between a variety of playable Bloodlines with different spectacular abilities, from the awesome strength of the Vanguard to the deceptive magic of the Harbinger."

name: Puyo Puyo Fever Touch Lite
description: Puyo Puyo Fever Touch Lite is a puzzle game developed by Sega for Android and iOS devices. It is the free version of Puyo Puyo Fever Touch. The iOS version was only available through the Sega Collection app.

name: Miscrits: World of Creatures
description: Capture, evolve, and battle mysterious creatures called Miscrits.

name: Popstars
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombies!!!
description: Zombies!!! the popular board game from Twilight Creations Inc. comes to Windows Phone 7 and Windows 8.

name: Zeit 2
description: Zeit 2 (stylized as Zeit²) is a traditional side-scrolling, 2D, shoot-'em-up game that brings unprecedented elements to the game experience. Zeit 2’s unique time travel feature has yet to be seen in this genre even after decades of great games.

name: Westward Kingdoms
description: Embark on a marvelous medieval quest to prove your worth and regain the king's favor in Westward Kingdoms, a thrilling real-time strategy adventure game! Help Prince Fenwick and Princess Catherine roam the countryside as they seek the guidance of friendly Kings, Countesses, Dukes, and loyal subjects.

name: The Powermon Adventure!
description: The Powermon Adventure! is a Pokémon fangame made by Scott Cawthon.

name: Avatar of War: The Dark Lord
description: Avatar of war: The Dark Lord is an addictive and fun line drawing strategy game. You can draw different gestures to command your troop to defeat the undead army!

name: Illness
description: Traditional Yume Nikki fangame, its gameplay is centered on the exploration of a Origamitsuki's dreams. It's unique characteristics are the existence of several effects on the same maps and its hallmark zoomorphic panoramas.

name: Crimzon Clover
description:
Crimzon Clover is a doujin Vertical Scrolling Shooter developed by Yotsubane. It was initially released at Comiket 79 and has gone gold, with a retail release date of January 3, 2011.
The plot-less premise is simple: fly through five different stages, using your chosen ship's weapons and Break Modes to destroy waves upon waves of enemies while dodging constant bullet barrages and racking up multipliers and points. There are three different ships to play as, as well as three different modes, all of which provide unique gameplay experiences.

name: DC Universe Online: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle Bears 1 Mac
description: Sin descripción

name: Let's Golf 2
description:
Looking for a faster, more colorful and fun golf experience? Then this newest edition of the popular Let’s Golf series is just the thing you need for the most exciting golf adventure you’ll ever find!

- Select from 8 fun 3D characters that you can customize with unlocked caps, clothes and golf balls.
- Watch your character gain experience with each game & unleash special powers like rewinding time.
- Play 108 holes in 6 far-out spots like an Aztec Jungle, a winter wonderland in Greenland & a wild African Safari.
- See how you rate against the world with the online leaderboard, or challenge friends in multiplayer.
- Take on the new Career mode or just have fun with a variety of new challenges.

name: DC Universe Online
description: DC Universe Online is a free-to-play superhero / supervillian MMORPG that lets players create their own unique tights-wearing hero or villain and roam the streets of places like Gotham City and Metropolis fighting or creating crime. Players fight alongside such iconic DC Comics characters as Superman and Batman, Lex Luthor and The Joker, and many others. Excellent physics help bring comic book action and combat to life, all under the creative direction of noted comic book artist Jim Lee.

name: Eterna
description: A citizen science puzzle game about RNA folding.

name: Dr. Jekyll and Mr Hyde: The Strange Case
description: You'll find yourself face-to-face with the original boogey man in this thrilling hidden-object adventure based on Robert Louis Stevenson's famous "Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde"! It's a story as old as time itself, which pops up occasionally even today (speaking of which, has anybody seen or talked to Mel Gibson lately?). A solid, decent fella starts conducting experiments on himself with less than desirable results - a violent inner monster is released; certain horrendous crimes are committed and so on and so forth. Jekyll's loyal friend Gabriel John Utterson finds himself in the unenviable position of having to prove the honorable Jekyll and despicable Hyde are one and the same.

name: Surfacer+
description: Surfacer+ is easy to pick up and has totally innovative game play that's suitable for all gamers – casual and hard-core alike.

name: EJ Puzzles: Hooked
description: Can you catch all the fish?

name: Winter Sports 2011: Go for Gold
description: Winter Sports 2011 is the ultimate challenge for casual gamers and sport fans, that includes the nine winter sport disciplines. Thanks to improved multiplayer mode it offers more direct interaction with the players opponents. Thus, there are several disciplines, like snowboard cross, in which all players can participate simultaneously. In each competition, whether multiplayer or single player, players can choose from a variety of tactical possibilities, as for example skating in slipstreams, turbo or hard physical impacts. Moreover, every fair or unfair behavior affects the qualities and the appearance of the players.

name: Half-Life: The Alpha Unit
description:
You play as Corporal Daniel Fletcher and your mission is to recover data from the Anomalous Materials Laboratory.

Along the way you will encounter all sorts of enemies and eventually rejoin your unit. Can you complete your objective?

name: 1942 Mobile
description: Have you got what it takes to be a WW II fighter ace? 1942 will put your flying skills to the ultimate test! The Second World War: The tank of your airplane is filled up with kerosene and our machine guns are fully-loaded! But be careful: Your opponents are numerous and well armed. Sometimes a few loopings help in order to free yourself from a situation offering no other prospects. As reward after endured attack waves you will receive power ups, which boast your attack and defence capabilities. A classical and well known game that guarantees no boredom.

name: I'm Scared of Girls
description: I’m Scared of Girls, a small RPG Maker 2003 story-driven adventure game developed and published in the rpgmaker.net community by Moga (also known by the username CARRIONBLUE). It tells the story of Lamb, a young cross-dresser who finds himself in a purgatory-like dungeon. There, he must cut the ties to his former life in order to be reborn.

name: Once Upon A Time
description:
Once upon a time is a group of 4 fairytales as different play options on the Wii. The game is interactive and aimed at children 3+ who either cannot read and write up to those that can in the early stages. Interaction is the key to the title which has 3 Game modes being Listen to the Story, Tell you own Story, mini games designed for he young covering puzzles, wiggling on animation, grouping pairs and a memory game. The four classic stories are Ugly Duckling, Red Riding Hood, Three little pigs, Puss in boots of which there are 54 interactive book pages and over 300 animated objects set to the background sounds of the stories which was recorded by actors and lasts for over 1 hour. 
 
Features 
 
• 4 classic childrens fairy tales. 
• Studio recorded voiceovers with professional actors. 
• 3 different game modes to choose from.

name: Armor Mayhem
description: Armor Mayhem is a side-scrolling shooter game developed by Louissi. It features a full-fledged campaign, which is played both to progress through the story and earn money which is used to purchase new weapons and armor from the armory.

name: Nancy Drew Triple Threat
description:
Play as Nancy Drew and solve the case / A challenging and exciting adventure / ESRB Rating E Everyone Roll the Dice in an Intricate Mini-Game Earn and Spend Euros on Trinkets and Souvenirs at the Castle Store Delve into German Culture Discover Captivating Facts and Local Lore. 
 
Includes games 4, 5, & 6.

name: Pinball FX 2: Marvel Pinball - Vengeance and Virtue
description:
Marvel Pinball is an arcade pinball video game developed by Zen Studios. It features Marvel Comics-themed pinball tables. It is available as a standalone game for the PlayStation 3 via the PlayStation Network, and as downloadable content for Pinball FX 2 on the Xbox 360 via Xbox Live Arcade. Its content on the PlayStation 3 is also playable in Zen Pinball 2. It is the second pinball title for the PlayStation 3, succeeding Zen Pinball. It was released on December 8, 2010 on the Xbox 360 and December 14, 2010 on the PlayStation 3.

The game was positively received by critics. It holds an aggregate score of 87.73% on the Xbox 360 and 82.85% on the PlayStation 3 at GameRankings. Reviewers praised the visual presentation of each table, and commented specifically on the bright colors and animated characters. Most reviewers felt the table design was excellent, however some felt that certain sections of the table felt bare. Critics generally felt that it was an excellent value for the cost.[citation needed] Sales during the month of its release exceeded 47,000 copies on the Xbox 360 and 19,000 on the PlayStation 3.[citation needed]

name: Mystery Case Files: 13th Skull
description: Mystery Case Files: 13th Skull is an adventure-puzzle casual game developed by Big Fish Studios and distributed by Big Fish Games. It is the seventh installment in the Mystery Case Files series. The game is available exclusively on the Big Fish Games website.

name: Red Gun
description:
For those of you that wonder “who is Red Gun?”, I’ll say, welcome. You don’t know me yet, and I am a man with good manners. Let me tell you something: it`s not who we are, it’s what we have done. For those of you that know me, you may be here for two different reasons: you are looking for blood or justice.
But for all of you, I have an offer you can’t reject. Come with me, polish your Colt and grab a dozen bullets. Red Gun is my life, a path of death, blood and glory. Inside, there is no room for mercy. This is not a game kid, here you come to die.
Now you know more about me, let me introduce myself: I am Red Stanton. I am Red Gun.

name: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light: Raziel and Kain Character Pack
description: Grab a friend or go at it alone as Kain and Raziel from the Legacy of Kain games. The two iconic characters must work together to defeat a new threat in an unfamiliar world.

name: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light: Hazardous Reunion - Challenge Pack 3
description: Four new challenge maps featuring mind-boggling puzzles, waves of intense combat action, and a fiery reunion with an old friend.

name: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light: Things that Go Boom - Challenge Pack 2
description: Four new explosive challenge maps featuring a variety of tense puzzles, deadly traps, and relentless combat encounters.

name: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light: All the Trappings - Challenge Pack 1
description: Four new challenge maps filled with hordes of undead enemies and devious traps you must maneuver and exploit to survive.

name: Super Mario Bros Galaxy DS
description: Super Mario Bros. Galaxy DS is a homebrew fan game for the Nintendo DS by The Dark Master inspired by Super Mario Galaxy.

name: Sora no Otoshimono Forte: Dreamy Season
description: Sin descripción

name: The Flying Hamster
description: Take control of Newton, the flying hamster in this action-frenzy horizontal shooter. You will fly across six unique environments, from the sunflower fields to the big Japanese city or the crazy ancient Egypt. Eight freaky weapons are scattered among the levels, and you'll need them all to take on the more than 35 different enemies (sneaky penguins, anti-air cows, exploding foxes, ninja squirrels, toaster-robots...) as well as the six dreadful and unpredictable bosses.

name: Boom Beats
description: Boom Beats is an addictive rhythm game which lets you enter compelling worlds full of club tunes: drum and bass, jungle, dub step, rave and house. All you need to do is tap the rhythm and earn score. Use multipliers, unlocks, special powers and more. Headphones recommended.

name: Mini Golf Resort DS
description:
The DS port of the Wii game Mini Golf Resort.
An improved version was released digitally for the 3DS.

name: Phantasmat
description: Phantasmat is a hidden object adventure game from developer Codeminion.

name: Persona 3 Escape
description: Persona 3 Escape is a Persona 3 spin-off developed for Japanese mobile phones. The game takes place during the love hotel scene on the third full moon.

name: The Legend of Zelda: PuzzleDude's Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: FeralHeart
description:
FeralHeart is the official replacement of KovuLKD's old game Impressive Title.

FeralHeart is an online animal based roleplaying game and chat where you choose what kind of feral you'll be. Create your character and explore worlds with it in this 3D game and maybe even make friends on the way.

name: Blaster Tank
description: Blaster Tank is an autoscrolling 2D shooter released for iOS

name: Sudoku
description:
Sudoku by Brainium is the #1 classic Sudoku game you know and love for your iPhone and iPad, and the best way to learn and improve your skills in this classic puzzle game.

With our Sudoku app, not only will you play a beautiful user-friendly Sudoku, but you’ll have access to the world’s most friendly and complete mobile Sudoku learning system.

With every puzzle, our “Hint” button can teach you the techniques you need to make progress. The instructions are easy to understand and unique for every puzzle with helpful animations, and colorful visuals. The hints don’t just give you the answer, they help you learn “why” the answer is what it is. This feature will help you learn all the techniques you need to solve Sudoku puzzles whether you’re a complete novice playing your first game, all the way to the expert difficulty.

Enjoy a clear, easy to read and customizable Sudoku board with visual guides that make glancing at the possibilities a breeze.

Our input system is designed to make entering solutions and notes magically simple and our friendly scoring system allows you to compete with yourself or your friends regardless of skill level.

Sudoku by Brainium is the most beautiful, learnable, and user-friendly Sudoku game you've ever played before.

name: Velocispider
description: Part Spider, Part Velociraptor, it's Velocispider!!! Take control of a heavily armed araknasaur in this retro arcade shoot-em-up.

name: SaGa 3: Jikuu no Hasha - Shadow or Light
description: SaGa 3: Jikuu no Hasha - Shadow or Light is a game released in 2011 for the Nintendo DS exclusively in Japan. The game is a remake of SaGa 3: Jikuu no Hasha, featuring full 3D cel-shaded graphics, all new artwork by Gen Kobayashi and an arranged soundtrack by Kenji Ito.

name: Tilt to Live
description: How do you play Tilt to Live? Just pick that bad boy up and tilt. Tilt for your life! Lure relentless red foes over to a handy nuke orb, then ram it and blow the bajeezes out of them. Think you can exterminate your enemies faster than they can multiply? Think again.

name: NeoGeo Heroes Ultimate Shooting
description: 10 great SNK heroes and heroines have left their worlds to answer Dr. Brown Sugar's "call for peace". Now, head to the skies to save the world from the threat of "THE DAMNED", an evil organization which plots to use a time machine for its maleficent purposes.

name: Football Manager Handheld 2011
description: With more new features than ever before, including real-time contract negotiation, a revamped training system and a number of match engine improvements, Football Manager 2011 will once again raise the bar for Soccer management games.

name: Inotia 3: Children of Carnia
description:
Protect your loved ones in Carnia by joining the adventure! 
What would it take to change a warrior's destiny? 
 
An inevitable fate lies before the children of Carnia. The greatest epic adventure RPG by far! The Chronicles of Inotia 3! The new legend is about to begin in the continent of Inotia. 
 
"With the coming of age ritual ahead, Lucio and Ameli from Carnia village happen to be acquiring guntlets, and the adventure stirred up by these guntlets leads to a consequence that is a way beyond their imaginations against monsters... Lucio and Ameli realize soon that they have extraordinary destinies lain before them... Warriors' fates have been predestined for thousands of years already... Will those who are born to be warriors be happy after all?"

name: Sierra 7
description: This game pinpoints a world-wide war between private militia companies out for government-targeted violence & carnage. The player of this game is the 7th special operative in the Unit "Sierra" which is tasked to neutralize the militia forces with their superior skills & tactics.

name: Abble Dabble HD
description: Abble Dabble is the revolution of crossword games with classic word play with a new twist. Expand your game. It's like yoga for your mind.

name: Wizard's Keep
description: The land is under attack from an evil wizard and it is up to one adventurous hero to defeat him and save the land

name: Cake Mania: To the Max!
description: Flashback to the neon-soaked 80's and help a teenage Jill Evans find her true calling in Cake Mania: To the Max!, the sixth chapter in the popular time management series Cake Mania! Help Jill juggle the waves of demanding customers that line the Evans Bakery counters as she prepares for the biggest night in her young life! With all-new equipment upgrades, updated shop mechanics, and interior improvements designed to increase performance, you'll have Jill on the path to becoming a world-class baker in no time. Play through 100 action-packed levels in Cake Mania: To the Max!

name: The Anomaly
description: Medium-sized base map with a unique twist: 'anomalies' have warped several areas which now play tricks on the player's mind and perception.

name: M.O.Z.O.X.: Space Salvager
description: Sin descripción

name: Bubble Bust!
description: Your goal is to clear the marbles and bust the hidden key bubble. Clear the marbles by making groups of the same color. Groups of three or more marbles of the same color will fall down. If the marbles cross the glowing line at the bottom of the screen, the game is over.

name: Baby Ninja Jump
description: Baby Ninja Jump is a Doodle Jump, clone.

name: Ricochet HD
description: Ricochet HD is an intense action game combining equal parts skill and strategy. With the most comprehensive feature set of any game in this genre, Ricochet HD's dynamic and interactive brick busting levels reward strategic play while the arsenal of power-ups allows you to obliterate everything in your path. 150 dynamic multi-staged unlocking levels deliver hours of non-stop action.

name: CrimeCraft Bleedout
description: When the world's precious commodity starts getting too pricey, riots will be the least to worry about. An expansion to CrimeCraft, the BleedOut campaign will be helmed by comic book artist and set to release with alongside the BleedOut: Graphic Novel.

name: MicroBot
description:
MicroBot is a twin-stick shooter video game developed by Naked Sky Entertainment and published by Electronic Arts. It was released on the Xbox 360 via Xbox Live Arcade on December 29, 2010 and on PlayStation 3 via the PlayStation Network on January 4, 2011. In the game the player controls a MicroBot; a microscopic robot designed to combat infections in the human body. The robot is tasked with destroying previous generation MicroBots which have become corrupted while fighting disease in the body.

Critics were divided on their opinions of the game, but overall review scores were moderate. Aggregate scores averaged in the 60% range for both platforms at websites GameRankings and Metacritic. Most reviewers praised the game's visual and audio presentation. They felt that the environments were convincing as areas of the body and that the soundtrack was strong. Critics differed in opinion in regards to gameplay; many praised the addition of local cooperative play and the ability to upgrade the MicroBot with new weaponry and features, but many felt the game did not add enough new gameplay elements to the genre to keep the player interested long-term.

name: Hot Shots Shorties: Yellow
description: Sin descripción

description: You'll need a sharp eye and a quick mind to complete 100 themed word- search puzzles.

name: Ghost Mania
description: A block matching puzzle game.

name: Blue Madonna
description: Sin descripción

name: CreaVures
description: Take control of five cute, mystical creatures of miniature proportions called CreaVures. CreaVures always travel in pairs, and they must use their special abilities to help each other solve interesting platforming puzzles. Set in a world with beautiful phosphorescent colors, these tiny creatures journey to save their homeland and restore light to their dying forest.

name: Don't Look!
description: My MAGS entry for December 2010: "Discovery" Little Sharon is afraid of the dark, what will await her when she goes to sleep? The game is done in 32-bit color, but I did stick to an 8-bit palette. Certain effects only work with 32-bit, so using that was necessary.

name: (heart) Sudoku
description:
(heart) Sudoku provides unlimited puzzles at 17 difficulty levels. Novices and experienced players alike will enjoy our extensive feature set, tutorial, and advanced hint system. The more you play, the more you will enjoy Sudoku!

Our multi-stage hint system starts with a gentle reminder to get you back on track, and works up to demonstrate the exact technique to use. Our hints ease those frustrating moments and teach you how to be a better player.

Features include:

- Puzzle generator for unlimited play
- 17 difficulty levels, something for everyone
- Tutorial teaches you new techniques
- Enter games from the newspaper
- Solver helps you with games from the newspaper
- Advanced techniques at the higher levels, including X-Wings, sashimi fish, and XY-Chains
- Choice of six color schemes
- Undo/redo
- Automatic or manual pencil marks
- Save your game while you try alternatives
- Highlighting helps you discover patterns
- Game clock; compares your time to other players
- Avoids graphic frills that distract from play
- Choice of digit styles, including Kanji and Hanzi

All games are true Sudoku, with symmetry and a single solution that can be discovered by logic alone. If you doubt that a puzzle can be solved by logic, simply have the hint system explain it to you step by step.

If you enjoy Sudoku, this is the app for you!

name: Super Mario Bros. 2 Deluxe
description: A full ROM hack for Super Mario World where you return to the world of Sub-Con to rescue the subcons and the princess from Bowser! All the graphics and levels have been changed and the game looks a lot like the original Super Mario Bros.2 title but with enhancements.

name: Casketball Queen
description: Cleo plays Casketball

name: Meteor Shower
description: Meteors are falling to Earth! Defend Earth's surface by blasting away at the falling rocks... But beware! Alien forces have learned what was happening and are taking advantage of our vulnerability to attack us!

name: Lamecraft
description: Lamecraft, developed by Drakon, is a game revolved around building with cube blocks of all types. You can build huge castles, or you can build tiny huts, either way the world can all be edited all you want. Everyday Drakon's working hard to provide you all of the fun and joy you wish to and have and more!

name: Safari Islands
description: Safari Islands is a game world where you explore two tribes and their habitat. You choose the tribe to which you belong, and you get to know other characters in your tribe. Some of them will send you on scavenger hunt-like quests, some will have puzzles for you to solve.

name: Amaura on the High Seas
description:
Broke and stuck without a job, Amaura's life has hit a new low. So she does what any logical Pokemon would do: become a pirate, of course!
In this Pokemon Mystery Dungeon Rom Hack, help Amaura become a pirate in a whole new adventure!

name: Able Archer: Red Crucible 2
description: Red Crucible 2 is originally a browser-based, unity 3d supported "MMOFPS" game by Rocketeers Game studio.

name: Fruit Ninja FX
description: Sin descripción

name: Weapons of the Gods
description:
WOG or Weapons of the Gods is the Chinese online multiplayer RPG in which Gods and Demons battle each other for the artefacts known as the Weapons of the Gods. Running on Unreal Engine 3, this game truly stands out with its stunningly beautiful sceneries, fluid-feeling movement, impressive special effects, and dynamic shadows.

Gods and demons have fought for power over this world for many millennia, but neither side could prevail. It was decided to place the fate of the world in the hands of mortals by sending the Weapons of the Gods down to earth. These weapons are so peculiar, so powerful, so fascinating, that no human can ever resist the appeal. Sooner or later, either the gods will prevail and the earth shall bend before their will, or the demons will win and plunge the entire world into chaos and madness.

name: Exit Path 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Yeth
description: Yeth is a ROM hack of Sonic the Hedgehog. The game features an original character by the name of Yeth as he adventures through several new levels (and one familiar one).

name: Toonix World
description: Toonix was an online game, created and published by Cartoon Network. The major difference is that the game was free, without any subscriptions or purchases. It had some 3D models. The world was divided into three parts: Home World, Shop World and Game World. In 2015, a spinoff was created called SuperStadia and was focused on sports. In 2017, both Toonix and SupersStadia were closed and its website redirected to Cartoon Network website. In 2018, on the website toonix.com a streaming service appeared with the same name. Nowadays, only screenshots and videos of this game exist.

name: Embric of Wulfhammer's Castle
description: Embric of Wulfhammer's Castle is a free adventure RPG that focuses mostly on character interactions and relationships, with minimal combat. This game contains some adult situations and nudity.

name: Bang 2 Busters
description:
Bang² Busters (Bang Bang Busters) is a 46 meg action-platform type game from Visco which was originally intended to be released in 1994. It's play mechanics are similar to that of Mario Brothers, Snow Brothers, and similar style games. The two characters can actually "blow up" enemies by puffing them as is done in Dig Dug, and even toss them onto other enemies for chain points. It also contains special bonuses and many stage bosses.
It was rumored that the game was undergoing re-consideration for release in 2000. About a year later, Zupapa by FACE, also from 1994, made it to market instead in 2001. This is why there are two known versions of the game. The 1994 original & the 2000 revision. The game also goes by the names "Bang Busters" and "Bang 2 Busters" by some sources.

name: Crappy Day Enhanced Edition
description:
Help Dave escape from the terrible boss Don Nando Vito Bonaserra in a hectic running brake game realizes Dave's dream of "becoming an actor" 
 
 
In Crappy day enhanced edition you play as Dave, a little, funny and odd poop who wishes, at any cost, to become famous in entertainment world, and will try to escape a tiny trouble with his dad, the notorious Don Nando Vito Bonaserra, Godfather of Poo York. 
Run, jump, slide, dive, exceed atrocious and funny obstacles pervaded by a touch of madness that will get you smile and poop off at the same time 
Plus, you'll get some sort of assistance , throughout your adventure, from a suspicious guy with mustaches, apparently useless. 
 
Will you be able to make it through or be the poop you really are deep down? 
 
Note : Any reference to the names and places contained in this videogame is purely random.

name: Shira Oka - Second Chances
description:
Shira Oka: Second Chances is an anime-themed, single-player computer game under development by Okashi Studios. Visit the rest of this site for more information about the game, and join our forums to discuss the game with Okashi staff and other community members. 
Ever wonder how things might be different, if you could go back in time and re-live your past? The main character of Shira Oka: Second Chances is given that chance to find out. 
Will he get his act together, and become the person he always wanted to be? Will he pass all his classes with flying colors? Will he fall in love with the girl of his dreams? Or will he end up sad and lonely once again? 
His fate is in your hands. 
You control how he spends his time, who he becomes friends with, and who he falls in love with... if anyone. But no matter what choices you make, get ready for a roleplaying experience unlike any other.

name: SpaceChem
description: Take on the role of a Reactor Engineer working for SpaceChem, the leading chemical synthesizer for frontier colonies. Construct elaborate factories to transform raw materials into valuable chemical products! Streamline your designs to meet production quotas and survive encounters with the sinister threats that plague SpaceChem.

name: Safecracker
description: A puzzle game in mini-games format where your goal is to crack open a safe.

name: Sonic Babies
description: Sin descripción

name: Skypop Scramble
description: In this SHMUPS-style shooter, Mario and 3 other pilots work together to fend off the forces of evil trying to take over. Use your skills to beat them and save the day!

name: A Paper Mario Puzzle Game
description:
A Paper Mario -themed puzzle game. Can you reach the target score before the time runs out?
Use items and partners to score more points.

name: Mechanic Man
description: The evil scientist Dr. Bronze has stolen manufacturing equipment in order to assemble his own army of killer robots! Join our brave hero, Steel, as he journeys to take down the CU brand androids and storm Bronze’s facility to save the world. Run, jump, and shoot through ten stages filled with dangerous foes, tight platforming and intimidating bosses. It’s now or never, so fight, Steel! For everlasting peace!

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010: Part 2
description: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010: Part 2 is a Java mobile installment of the TV series of the same name, and also the second part to Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010
description: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010 is a Java mobile game based on the Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? series.

name: Antistar 3D: Rising
description:
Antistar 3D: Rising was a fantasy adventure game released on iOS devices in 2010.

“Gazing at the shiny crescent looming overhead, I get an impossible sense of longing; but also… sadness, and fear.

Who am I?”

Set in a world of fable and wonders, with inspiration ranging from Final Fantasy to Studio Ghibli, Antistar tells of a determined, pig-tailed heroine, on a journey to retrieve her lost memories.

name: Cheestrings: Mr. Strings' World Tour
description: Draw a vehicle and join Mr Strings on his World Tour. You’ll meet hypnotic beavers, exploding pandas and maybe the elusive shycows! Amp up your vehicle with 24 power-up codes found on Cheestrings packs–try this 27684.

name: Riley's Letter Recycle
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Tower Assault
description:
Mega Tower Assault is a tower defence game similar to Desktop Tower Defense or Fieldrunners. As with other games of its kind, the idea is to prevent wave after wave of enemy troops to get to the player's command center. This is done by building stationary turrets that automatically shoot at the enemies that come within their range. At the start of the game the player has a small sum of cash that can be spent on different turrets such as chain guns, missiles and flame throwers. By destroying enemy troops and surviving waves the player gets more money that can be used for building new turrets or upgrade old turrets.

The game consists of four different scenarios (beach, snow, platform and lava) each with three levels. A level consists of 20 or more enemy waves and once completed the next is unlocked. While the first scenario (beach) is straightforward tower defending the later scenarios adds additional level features that lead to further tactical considerations for the player. In the snow scenario enemy soldiers can travel safely underground while the platform levels feature conveyor belts that increase the speed of the troops. The lava levels feature platforms that can be moved around by the player. Some levels have neutral buildings that can taken over by engineers. The player then receivers a special function that can be used at any time, for example a rocket attack that destroys all enemy troops.

name: Bubble Blast
description: The player must help Patrick with navigating the Chum Caverns by having him avoid bumping into stuff as he progresses.

name: SuperFly DX
description: SuperFly DX is a horizontally scrolling action game with deceptively simple one-button control and rock-solid 50/60fps gameplay. Beneath the initial simplicity lies a challenge to test the skills of even the very best gamers.

name: Warlords 2: Rise of Demons
description:
Warlords 2: Rise of Demons is a strategy game developed by Ben Olding games, and is a sequel to "Warlords: Call to Arms".

Pick from a variety of different races, from Humans, Elves, Trolls and the Undead, and even the demons themselves, to conquer the land of Beneril.

name: Hugo: De Første Tegn
description: Sin descripción

name: Drop
description: A simple "Inverse Doodle Jump" featuring retro graphics and addictive gameplay.

name: Hungry Shark: Part 2
description: Hungry Shark: Part 2 was the second Hungry Shark game in the franchise, and the sequel to Hungry Shark: Part 1. It featured a diverse range of brand new aquatic creatures to be eaten, treasures to be found and a Great White Shark-like creature as the star.

name: Hungry Shark: Part 1
description: Hungry Shark: Part 1 was the first ever Hungry Shark game, and the first game in the Hungry Shark Trilogy. It featured a diverse range of aquatic creatures to be eaten and treasures to be found. The game involves a creature resembling a Great White Shark that has a constant hunger.

name: Magnavox Odyssey DS
description:
Magnavox Odyssey DS is a port of the first ever home video game system released in 1972, Odyssey. It includes different chips which each chip contains a minigame.

The following games are available:

Chip 1 - No overlay.
Chip 2 - Simon Says, Skiing.
Chip 3 - Football, Hockey, Tennis, Analogic.
Chip 4 - Haunted House.

name: Tooi Tooi, Yakusoku: Tune of Memories
description: It’s been two months since Gen’s close friend Kotone passed away from sickness. All she left was a letter asking him to go treasure hunting together. Along with it was an old map. Since it is his final promise to her, he sets out on this journey to find something precious.

name: Pac-Mania
description: The iOS version features an additional scramble mode.

name: Batman: The Brave and the Bold - Streets of Gotham: Full Throttle
description:
Hit the streets or take to the air in the Gotham Grand Prix!
Now you can fly along with Gotham City's wildest rides!
Win to unlock more bonus features.
Come in first on the driving levels and watch a special video associated with each track!
Come in first on any one of the flying tracks and take flight in the Batjet!

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Vegas Collection
description: A collection of both Rainbow Six Vegas & Rainbow Six Vegas 2. Rainbow operatives take to the chaotic streets of Las Vegas as an escalating terrorist siege in 'Sin City' threatens to take world terrorism to new, uncontrollable heights in Rainbow Six Vegas. In Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Vegas 2, it is your last chance to rescue America's sexiest city from an escalating terrorist siege that will force you into heart-pounding action from beginning to end. The best are back and this time winner takes all.

name: Eclipse
description:
﻿"His partner told him to shoot the criminal, so he picked up the gun and took a shot... ...even though that event has passed, the echo of a gunshot still resounds in his mind."

After having a bad dream of a hostage incident, Officer Kelvin Bishop awakens to a dark morning. The past still haunts him, but even so he has to get ready for work like every other day.
At the same time, but in a different place. Andrea Frost, an ordinary high school girl brings her friend to the hospital with her sister.

Suddenly there is an eclipse, and everything starts to go wrong. While she is struggling to get back home, Kelvin is struggling to get to the police station. A grieving man and an innocent girl are now trapped in the same situation.

Can this be just coincidence,
or is something more...? Something extraordinary.

name: Asphalt HD
description: An Asphalt game that released for mobile platform.

name: Gensokyo Pro Wrestling Muscle Tag Match
description: Fan remake and reskin of Tag Team Match: M.U.S.C.L.E for PC.

name: Maze of Apocrypha
description:
Maze of Apocrypha is a first person mazes adventure puzzle game in 3D for the Nintendo DS.

This homebrew was presented in the annual competition Drunken Coders 2010, ranked 1st.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: Raw Thrills’ newest arcade superstar Wheel of Fortune delivers the same glitz and glamor of the Mega Hit television game show. With a Hi Def 32inch LCD touchscreen, incredibly realistic graphics and a Larger than Life Wheel, this game is a winner with children and adults alike.

name: Combat Tournament
description: Combat Tournament is an awesome stickman fighting game. Aim of the game is to fight as long as you can. Move with arrow keys and jump with SPACE.

name: Glorg
description: Glorg is a procedurally-generated dungeon crawler RPG developed by Grapefrukt and released on October 21, 2010. The main gimmick of this game is that you use only one button, the left mouse button, to do everything.

name: Neon Race
description: In this car-racing game similar to Tron you'll drive a fast neon car and will have to crash into the red vehicles to destroy them. Avoid the purple ones and reach the goal in as little time as possible to unlock the next level and upgrade your car.

name: Build the Bridge
description: Physics game – build bridges so trains can get across safely.

name: MegaDrill
description:
“I’m gonna be rich!”
Upgrade that MegaDrill and dig down into the earth to salvage the treasures! You have 25 weeks to gather as much money as possible to buy the boat of your dream (maybe?) and go on a well earned vacation!

Tons of treasures, 12 trophies and 5 different endings based on your performances.
Play, upgrade and play again!

name: Notebook Wars
description:
Get ready for the ultimate notebook shooter!

Destroy hundreds of enemies and bosses to earn enough money to buy better planes and weapons, you have 40 different planes and 20 upgradable weapons to buy, and a survival mode… have fun!

name: Flunkerne: Robotter
description: Sin descripción

name: Flunkerne: Pirater
description: Sin descripción

name: Burger Maker
description: Burger Maker was a 2010 Flash game released on the McDonald's Pakistan website. The game had the player create McDonald's burgers.

name: Strum
description: Strum was a promotional music game released by McDonald's Pakistan in 2010. The game was based on the band Call, who composed the 2010 McDonald's jingle for the region.

name: Labyrinth
description: Labyrinth was a Flash game that was playable on the McDonald's Pakistan website in 2010. No details about the gameplay exist, however it is assumed from the existing image that it was a maze game.

name: Hangman
description: Hangman was a Flash game playable on the McDonald's Pakistan website. The game was a playable version of the game hangman.

name: Chase It!
description:
Chase It is a homebrew Atari 2600 game developed by Alan W. Smith and released in 2010. The game was later included in the Atari Flashback series of plug-and-play consoles, starting with the Atari Flashback 5 in 2014, and most recently in the Atari Flashback X Deluxe in 2019.

In Chase It, two players (or one player and the computer) must move around the arena and touch a red square before their opponent. After this, the red square(s) move to a random location, and the first to touch it 99 times is the winner.

A selection of 20 game modes add variety to the gameplay; including adding a second red square, making the red squares move, adding obstacles to the arena, and changing the speed of the computer opponent.

name: Terminator 2: Judgment Game
description: Terminator 2: Judgment Game is a mod for Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas released in 2010 based on the movie Terminator 2. The mod is a full recreation of the movie within the game.

name: Monopoly City
description: Monopoly City is a new imagination of the classic Monopoly board game. Play alone against the computer or against your friends in this new property builder title. Build houses, industrial complexes, skyscrapers and dominate your competition to become the ultimate winner.

name: Sonic X: Speed Spotter 2
description: Sonic X: Speed Spotter 2 is a Sonic X-themed game of spot the difference, and the sequel to Sonic Speed Spotter.

name: Ninja Chop!!
description: Xbox Live QTE indie game.

name: Final Fantasy I & II: Mod of Balance
description: Sin descripción

name: Paint Works
description: Named after the classic quick guessing show on German television, Die Montagsmaler guarantees real creative fun for the whole family on the Wii. This makes it the first painting and creative game format on the motion console. It is all about drawing, guessing, painting and colouring. Whether alone or with up to four players - this game offers variety and pure entertainment. The party really gets going, especially in multiplayer mode: grab friends or family and off you go! Whoever guesses the searched terms first in the game »Monday Painter« wins the match. The game principle used is intuitive and ensures long-lasting guessing fun. But the single player mode is also impressive: Here the player draws figures, stamps or sprays crazy motifs. Features: * The first painting fun for the Wii: 14 different games about painting, drawing and colors * Let your creativity run free: Large creative part with paint boxes, mandalas and collages * Which one of you is the next Picasso? Gallery to save your own artworks * Also included: Over 500 terms for tracing and guessing are included with the game on extra playing cards. This is how »The Monday painter« becomes a real parlor game! * Dexterity, guesswork and creativity: For 1-4 players

name: My Pet World
description: Make your favorite animals better again! The animals, your best friends, are sick and they need your care. With the help of enthusiastic veterinarians, you can solve real medical files. After your diagnosis, you give the animals the right treatment. Then you nurse the animals until they are strong enough to go home again. The fate of your favorite animals is in your hands. In brief: * More than 20 different animal species to take care of. * Diagnose, treat and monitor the animals as they recover. * 30 challenging medical records written by real vets. * You become a better vet and get more and more tools at your disposal. * Fully Dutch speaking

name: Super Mario Bros. Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Junior Fitness Trainer
description: Get ready for hours of fitness fun with Junior Fitness Trainer. Explore the sunny Junior Fitness island resort filled with 10 exciting beach aerobic activities.

name: Romancing Mario
description: Sin descripción

name: Free Fall
description: 2D action game, developed by Color Dreams. The game was never released, remaining only in the prototype phase. However, independent companies released it in 2010 (National Games Depot - NDG, The NES Dump) and Piko Interactive released it again in 2017. Released exclusively for NES. You control a hand who must catch falling things and then throw them back up to safety.

name: A Vampire Romance: Paris Stories
description:
A young art student moves to Paris and falls in love with a young and enigmatic man. When her new love suddenly disappears, she must travel the city, solve a mystery, and discover her lover's secrets in this thrilling adventure!

Investigate the Seine river banks, the Pére Lachaise Cementery and more as you uncover clues and determine your destiny.

name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit
description: Feel as a driver to be chased by a racer driving a cool car with tuning or feel the excitement of the stalker! In this new part of the super-race, you can start a career of a street racer and a policeman! Challenge the law behind the wheel of supercars of Pagani Zonda Cinque class or stop the drivers in such high-speed police interceptors as Lamborghini Gallardo LP 560-4 Spyder! Get all the achievements and awards in the saturated with adrenalin 24-hour chases and harassments!

name: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands
Café Mania
description: A restaurant business simulator which was very popular in Brazil.

name: Doom: Barracks Zone
description: Doom: Barracks Zone (more commonly called DBZone) is a episode replacement by Tails, Mario and Howie, members of the DOOM Barracks clan and mapping team, primarily comprised of players from Taiwan and Hong Kong. It is meant for ZDoom-based source ports, and contains nine maps primarily aimed towards cooperative multiplayer, but fully playable in single player as well. Development of DBZone started in 2006, with the release of home.wad by Tails, which later evolved into the first map of the episode, DOOM City. The PWAD furthermore has several changes via DeHackEd and DECORATE: many of the vanilla enemies are made to attack or move faster, and a new weapon and monsters are also included.

name: Cala a Boca, Galvão!
description: Cala a Boca, Galvão! is a whac-a-mole game based on the internet phenomena of the same name, where you "shut up" the Brazilian sports narrator Galvão Bueno by adding tape in his mouth.

name: Pop Moto
description:
Pop Moto is a motorcycle competition machine, featuring with 32 inch LCD screen, displays 16: 9 high resolution graphic effect with realistic motion motorcycle and real streets themes.

This moto car machine appears in unique bright LED lighting design, stereoscopic sound system and includes five racing tracks.

In the racing game play, the player can light up speed from special powerful mode, such as missiles, mines, liquid nitrogen (for a boost) and shields.

name: Andrio's World
description: Andrio's World, formerly known as Mobile Andrio, is an Android Mario game, strongly based on Super Mario World, developed and published by Jörg Jahnkel on 2010. At an unknown point, Nintendo sent a copyright claim and the game got taken down from the Play Store.

description: Port of Smart Dart from the Sport Vii.

name: Where We Remain
description: Where We Remain is an adventure set on a desert island, shown from a zoomed out, almost top-down view. The content is procedurally-generated and the setup of the island is different for each session. At first glance it seems similar to the 8 and 16 bit Zelda games, but it only borrows that shape to tell its story.

name: Os Encolhidos
description: Os Encolhidos is a web browser game based on the segment featured on Domingão do Faustão.

name: Boondog
description: Harking back to the days of classic precision platformers such as Flashback and Prince of Persia, Boondog demands that you carefully consider each move that you make: a single incorrect leap, turn, or drop can end in disaster.

name: Corporate Climber
description: It takes hard work and dedication to earn a seat in the boardroom of a big corporation these days. Corporate Climber chronicles one man’s climb from lowly janitor to suit-wearing bigwig—and then his swift fall from grace.

name: Record Tripping
description: An immersive gaming experience that begins with the scratch of a record.

name: Specter Spelunker Shrinks
description: Specter Spelunker Shrinks is about a platforming hero who will jump, grow, shrink, and whatever else it takes to make it back to his home on the moon.

name: Quietus
description: As he’s taking a man’s life, Death decides to have a little fun. He tells the man that he will give him his life back along with everything he ever wanted—if the man can survive the Gauntlet of Hell.

name: PlayPen
description: A gigantic community-built adventure game. A nonsensical pixel art wiki adventure. A toilet wall for the internet.

name: Looming
description: Looming follows an unnamed protagonist as he explores the plains of a mysterious world, finds clues, and uncovers a variety of beautiful intertwining stories.

name: p0nd
description: P0nd is a one-button, flash game by PeanutGallery.

name: You Have No Legs
description: Control Jack, an archaeology student who lost both his legs during an earthquake while working in Teotihuacan, Mexico. Look for ancient treasures and move around the temple using only his arms!

name: Hoshi Saga 4: Ringo
description: Hoshi Saga Ringo is the fourth installment in the Hoshi Saga series, and while it might not be as difficult as its predecessors, Ishii-san brings new life to the game with his beautiful artwork and use of gradients.

name: Darkfate
description: Darkfate is an exploration platformer that follows Chris Freeman, a man whose memory has failed him. He has no idea why he’s wandering around a snowy mountainside in freezing weather and decides to venture into nearby caves to seek out answers. During his odyssey, he keeps a record of his thoughts in a journal.

name: Flood the Chamber
description: A prisoner has escaped from solitary confinement and is trying to escape from prison. As he runs off towards the exit, a guard shouts “Flood the chamber!” and water begins to rise, leaving the rogue in quite a predicament.

name: The Hive
description: In The Hive you play as Alex Rig, a reporter who was investigating a missing persons case when he discovers a heavily-fortified research facility while snooping around for clues. Similar to Iji, Prince of Persia and Flashback, Alex will be doing a lot of climbing up platforms and crawling through air vents to find ammunition or health-replenishing items that he can keep in his inventory for later use.

name: The Soul of Dracula
description: The Soul of Dracula is a dark Japanese platformer heavily inspired by the classic Castlevania series. A vampire hunter journeys to the Dark Prince’s castle armed with a rather familiar whip, which he can use to cut down the skeletons, bats, and ghouls that cross his path.

name: Illuminator
description: Armed with just a flashlight, a boy sets out to save his sister from a band of nasty ghouls who have the ability to tear through the fabric of space and who travel from house to house in the dead of night.

name: Girlfriend vs. Boyfriend
description: In Girlfriend vs. Boyfriend, you play a guy who is in serious trouble with his girlfriend for eyeballing another woman. She proceeds to chase you, throwing all sorts of objects your way, including fruit, animals, and tables.

name: They Need To Be Fed
description: Run and jump through 11 crazy worlds to feed the monsters in this 360° gravity platformer. It doesn't matter which way you go; up or down, left or right, you can't fall off because of the 360° gravity!

name: Man Enough
description:
Why play one game when you can play four games at once? In Man Enough,
there are four completely different games all running at the same time and
you must use the arrow keys and the space bar to beat each simultaneously.

name: UFO on Tape
description: The truth is out there! UFO on Tape puts you in the role of one lucky guy who has managed to spot a UFO. Fortunately, he’s got his trusty (and very shaky) camcorder on hand to film the evidence.

name: The Day
description:
It's Tia's birthday, and she's looking forward to beating all of her friends with the new card her dad gave her! Beat the other kids by choosing the right cards, and earn more cards until you're the best of them all!

And don't go into the woods, or the guards will kill you.

This is a Flash game from Gregory Avery-Weir, released in 2010 and now available as a downloadable projector for the first time.

name: New Deal or No Deal
description: New Deal or No Deal is the second mobile game based on the UK version of the game show Deal or No Deal. The main difference from the previous game is that the player starts out on the Contestant's Row which means he has to wait for his turn while watching other contestants first playing the game. At times, the contestants will ask the player for advice. Once the proper game has started it works like before with the player choosing to open boxes to reveal their contents while deciding whether to accept the banker's offer. If unsure it's possible to ask another contestant for advice. In addition to the main mode, there's a quick play mode that skips the contestant's row, a banker's mode where the player makes the offers and a shortened mode called What would you do now? which lasts for a maximum of four rounds.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Doodlepants
description: Sin descripción

name: Shatter Bot
description: Shatter the shackles of corporate tyranny in this action-packed shooter-platformer. Upgrade your ShatterBot, unlock new weapons, and blast all around you to smithereens! Features fully destructible, procedurally generated levels, guaranteed to challenge even the most experienced robo pilot.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2011
description: Port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2011 for Java ME.

name: FIFA Soccer 12
description: Smartphone port of FIFA Soccer 12.

name: FIFA Soccer 11
description: PS2 port of FIFA Soccer 11.

name: FIFA Soccer 11
description: PSP port of FIFA Soccer 11.

name: FIFA Soccer 11
description: Wii port of FIFA Soccer 11.

name: FIFA Soccer 11
description: Mobile (Java ME) port of FIFA Soccer 11.

name: FIFA Soccer 11
description: Smartphone port of FIFA Soccer 11.

name: Gênio Quiz 5
description: Gênio Quiz 3 is the fifth entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

name: Gênio Quiz 4
description: Gênio Quiz 3 is the fourth entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

name: Gênio Quiz 3
description: Gênio Quiz 3 is the third entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

name: Gênio Quiz 2
description: Gênio Quiz 2 is a sequel to Gênio Quiz with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

name: Gênio Quiz
description: Gênio Quiz is a free browser trivia game with 50 questions that challenges your brain, developed by André Birnfeld and released on his defunct website, lol.net.br.

name: Block Breaker 3 Unlimited
description:
An arcade game by Gameloft.
Break on through to the next generation of Block Breaker! Experience deeper, more intricate levels that take you beyond a single screen full of blocks. Grab power-ups, trigger switches and blast through gateways to reach new areas as you push your way towards the top. Try to keep up with multiple balls on the same screen, or even multiple pads! The thrill never stops thanks to the level generator. Enemies and epic boss battles await you each step of the way, so stay focused and have a blast!

name: Hanger
description:
Make your way through 23 levels by swinging across bottomless pits, through tight gaps and pushing through obstacles.

Hang to the ceiling by pressing Space and use the left and right arrow keys to build momentum.

name: Pyramid Runner
description: Pyramid Runner is an arcade game where players descend into the ancient Egyptian pyramids in search of hidden gems. Collect gold, avoid traps, mummies and gorillas. Get to the secret room with untold riches and become the proud owner of a fortune.

name: Cubosphere
description: Cubosphere is a 3D remake of a classic game Kula World on PSX. The game concerns controlling a ball in order to collect all keys and reach the exit of the level.

name: Castle Cannon
description: Try to take the other castle down with your big blaster cannon! Aim and shoot at the other caste and buy some upgrades to defend your own castle!

name: IQ Ball
description:
Your goal is to get the little purple IQ Ball critter to the target. To do this, you shoot out with his grabber and latch onto things to move him along towards his goal.

The fewer the moves you use, the better!

name: Epic War 4: Alliance of Heroes
description: Epic War 4 is the sequel to Epic War 3. It is a tactical warfare game which starts out easy, but has a steep difficulty curve. The game revolves around summoning creatures and attack the opponent's castle. You must destroy your opponent's castle before he can destroy yours. The fourth Epic War game features a few improvements over the third.

name: Top Flight Turtle
description: In the future, turtles will have jetpacks! Maybe. Well, probably not, but if they did they'd have to patrol their turf with laser guns and bombs. Defend your pond as Top Flight Turtle!

name: Rainbow Breakout
description: A short and satisfying breakout concept game.

name: Mega Drive 4
description:
Second version of Mega Drive 4, which adds new games (going from 87 games to 100) and new songs to the game Guitar Idol.

The game Pense Bem is said to count as 10 games in the general counting.

name: Pedreiro Polar
description: Sin descripción

name: Dreamer Series: Zoo Keeper
description: A dream come true: you get a job at the zoo as caretaker of the baby animals. Exciting!

name: Arvoesine
description: Arvoesine is a short platformer action game. As the protagonist you will face numerous challenges and defeat enemies until you claim the victory.

name: Rhygar e os Soldados do Rei
description:
Rhygar is a farmer who lives with his father on their ranch. One day, he needs to sell their cow, only to watch his father being murdered by monsters on the way back home. Now, begins his journey to become a Knight of the King in order to get revenge on the monsters who killed his father.

Rhygar e os Soldados do Rei (Rhygar and the Knights of the King) is one of many free indie brazilian games created using RPG Maker 2000 during the boom of the engine in Brazil in the 2000s. Like others of its kind, it's very unpretentious and full of typos and goofy jokes. It became somewhat of a forgotten classic among brazilian gamers of that era, and its relative success helped the aforementioned boom of other small RPG Maker 2000 brazilian games, including two lesser known sequels.

name: Unfair Mario
description: In Unfair Mario nothing is as it seems. Try to avoid hidden traps and get to the final flag.

name: Zombie Infection 2
description: Zombie Infection 2 is a horror-themed action game played from a bird's view perspective that has game mechanics similar to its predecessor. The game plays the same as the original Zombie Infection but it's more action oriented and has less emphasis on survival horror elements.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2010
description: iOS port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2010.

name: Pac-Man's Arcade Party
description:
Includes Galaxian, Pac-Man, Rally-X, Galaga, Bosconian, Dig Dug, Xevious, Mappy, Pac-Mania, Galaga '88, Dragon Spirit and Rolling Thunder.
A home version was released that included Ms. Pac-Man.

name: Centipede
description: Port of the original Centipede Arcade for Windows.

name: Frogger
description: A remake of Frogger for mobile devices.

name: Mad Daedalus
description: Mad Daedalus is a digital pinball game created by Japanese developer LittleWing and released in 2010. It is a zany, sci-fi take on the myth of Daedalus, the architect of the Labyrinth on Crete.

name: Super Mario Bros. Star Scramble
description: Mushroom Kingdom is in danger! You, Mario, must save it – just find evil Bowser and fight with him to bring freedom to your land!

name: Railway Operation Simulator
description: Railway Operation Simulator is a free and open source railway signalling simulator, allowing you to build, timetable and operate your own railway, or one of many layouts from the community

name: Fanboy & Chum Chum: Arcade Raid
description: Fanboy & Chum Chum: Arcade Raid is a web game by Nickelodeon based on the show Fanboy & Chum Chum.

name: Nudo
description: Nudo is a minimalist platformer on top of a rubik’s cube.

name: Resonance
description: Resonance is a musical platform puzzle game originally created during the Global Game Jam in 2010 in the Netherlands, where it won both the audience award and the jury 1st prize.

name: Mahjong Memoirs
description: Sin descripción

name: Monopoly: Build A Lot
description: Sin descripción

name: Hoyle Puzzle & Board Games 2011
description: Sin descripción

name: Hoyle Crosswords & Sudoku
description: Sin descripción

name: Hoyle Casino Games 2011
description: Sin descripción

name: Hoyle Card Games 2011
description: Sin descripción

name: Princess Lillifee's Magic Fairy
description: Who does not know Princess Lillifee? The sweet little princess who lives in a fairy-tale castle with a wonderful garden around it. From morning to night, Lillifee takes care of all the animals and plants that live there. She wants to be a good friend to everyone and helps them with their questions or problems. With this first Lillifee NDS game, girls of 4 step into the magical dream world of Princess Lillifee, of which they themselves always dream! Dance with Lillifee, fly with her through various fairy-tale locations. Create magic-like paintings or play magic mini-games with Lillifee. Princess Lillifee wishes all players as much happiness in life as there are stars in the sky. This Nintendo DS is aimed perfectly at the target audience of Nintendo DS players. The games can be played on both screens, with very simple touch pen navigation and voice recognition, so that the smallest girls who cannot yet read can also play this magical game. Characteristics: Dance along with Lillifee Make Princess Lilliffee beautiful with makeup and beautiful dresses Make magic paintings Awaken beautiful butterflies Play magic mini-games, such as find-the-pearls, find the match

name: Glyph 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Fritz Chess Twelfth Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Penny Dreadfuls: Sweeney Todd
description: Sin descripción

name: Touhou Gendanshou: Unlimited Heroes
description: A doujin game by INSIDE SYSTEM based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Nanny 911
description: Sin descripción

name: Circus
description: Circus is an Action game, developed and published by 505 Games, which was released in Europe in 2010.

name: CityBuilder
description: Sin descripción

name: Reactor
description: The Reactor, is an officially licensed Sega Mega Drive console released by AtGames. It contains 20 Sega Mega Drive games and a further 30 "bonus" games.

name: Zone Sega
description:
Zone Sega (or Sega Zone) is a plug-in-and-play video game console first released in 2010. The console is built suspiciously like the Wii, having wireless controllers that look similar to television remotes and that respond to movement. It retails at £50 in the UK.

The Zone Sega is built off a similar console called the "Zone 40" (with 40 games) which in turn was built off the "Zone Wireless Gaming Console" (with 7 games). With the Zone Sega there are 50 built in games, 20 of which are Sega Mega Drive titles, 14 are "arcade games" and 16 are "Interactive Sports games" which make use of the motion control technology.

name: Dracula Series Episode 1: The Strange Case of Martha
description: Sin descripción

name: ArmageDoom
description:
ArmageDoom is a partial TC for Zdoom, GZdoom, Skulltag, or Zandronum.
It features 7 new levels, 12 new weapons, many new enemies (with older ones revamped), new gore, and many new stuff.

name: Station Spacewalk Game
description: Welcome to the International Space Station (ISS), Astronaut. In Station Spacewalk Game you'll experience the thrill of conducting NASA repair work on the International Space Station. After negotiating your way through the airlock, you, the astronaut, will be tasked with jobs critical to help power up the space station so it can continue to operate. First take your time to explore the station, but then it's time to get to work. You'll have to move quickly and carefully, with a limited quantity of oxygen you must complete your Extravehicular Activities (EVAs) and get back into the airlock before your air supply runs out.

name: LazyTown Live! The Pirate Adventure
description: LazyTown Live! The Pirate Adventure is a video game created for the live theater performance of the same name.

name: Festival Days Sim Date
description: In this town, there is a cultural festival starting in 30 days and that there are rumors that the festival will make one's relationship last forever. It is here that the players goal is set: find a boyfriend in 30 days. There are 12 endings.

name: Red Bull MotoCross 2D
description: Gorgeous graphics and effects, realistic physical models, all this awaits you in Red Bull Freestyle Motocross. Gather together all the power, skill, courage and talent to organize a real show for your friends. Discover new motorbikes and tricks. Improve your accomplishments. Red Bull Motocross game features: Six different game modes Four tracks (Mexico, Egypt, Moscow, Rome) and X-Fighters tour Four motorcycle, each one with its own behavior 12 different tricks, 8 of them must be unlocked Game keeps track of more than 20 different statistic data Full realistic effects Replays of your best races.

name: Invasion of the Zombie Monsters
description: Invasion of the Zombie Monsters is an arcade-platformer in wich you take control of Ned, who must try to save the world from the zombie hordes and take back his girlfriend!

name: Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Royal Thumble
description: Welcome to the Thumb Tournament! Several hooded thumbs are fighting for the coveted Royal Thumble title. Let the battle begin!

name: Street Cricket Champions
description: Street Cricket Champions is the first ever cricket game developed for the PS2 and PSP by an Indian game development studio. Released exclusively for India, it is a depiction of a freestyle cricket game called 'gully cricket' or 'street cricket' usually played in the streets of India.

name: Hellkid: Hook & Jump
description: HellKid is at its core a conventional 2D side-scrolling platform game, but with a lot of added twists and features. As Devi, your objective is to collect enough souls in your quest to become human! Souls come in various colors such as golden and blue, and each of the 12 levels in "Valley of Soul" with increasing difficulty contains more than 50 patterns to master.

name: Fancy Island
description: Fancy Island is a Japanese horror puzzle game with the front page being disguised as a cute Nekomimi illustration gallery front. Upon clicking the catgirl in the middle, the game will begin. The objective is to reach the goal gallery in a point-and-click environment while avoiding jumpscares/monsters.

name: Snake
description: An unofficial port of Snake for the Atari 2600.

name: Hack
description: Hack is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario World, and the first game in the Hack series by Golden Yoshi.

name: People Power: The Game of Civil Resistance
description:
People Power is about politics, about strategy and about social change. As a leader of a popular movement you will fight against tough adversaries who control the police, the army, the bureaucracy—even the media. The only weapon in your hand is your strategic skill and ingenuity.

But People Power is more than just a game. It’s an opportunity to join a community of others who want to learn about civil resistance and nonviolent strategies. The game allows you to design and play your own custom scenarios by using a Scenario Builder. Everyone can design scenarios and post them on the People Power forum, available to the whole community, where you can exchange ideas with other players and scenario writers.

name: Mr. Krasnoludek, Teach Me Your Magic Spells
description:
In this game, a cat named Theremin tries to learn the magic spells of Polish dwarves.
Wield devastating dark magic and explore an enchanted forest.
Experience a day and night system which changes the nature of enemy mobs.
Pick onions and potatoes and stuff, or make a friend!

name: N'Oubliez Jamais
description:
N'Oubliez Jamais is a Yume Nikki fangame, known for its unique, realistic approach to the dream system. As opposed to having a single, interconnected dream world, the player is randomly placed in a linear set of locations, the end of the dream depending on the choices of the player.

The game stars Al Ree, who, unlike many protagonists, lives in a three-room apartment with his parents and cat, and is able to exit his home.

name: Sick Mind
description: Sick Mind is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. It plays a bit differently than most Yume Nikki Fangames, in that the Nexus can be entered straight away by exiting the bedroom. The player can save anywhere from the menu or by using the desk in the main character's bedroom. The player can progress through the game by collecting effects and exploring new areas. Additionally, there are a couple of readable books on the bookshelf in the bedroom.

name: XA: Contra Los Cuatreros Galácticos
description: An advergame published in 2010 by Batovi Games Studio based on the Megaman series of games and created to advertise Calcar's products. Enjoy!

name: Alien Shooter 3D
description: Alien Shooter spin-off in a first-person perspective, For mobile phones.

name: Chess Brain Teasers 100,000
description: Chess Brain Teasers 100,000 it's a puzzle game about Chess.

name: Robotic Worlds
description: Robotic Worlds is a 3D logic game. Your mission is to free robots trapped in an evil computer labyrinth while avoiding deadly traps. Each robot shares linked controls, so when you move one, you move them all!

name: Seek and Find Collection 2
description: In Seek & Find Collection 2 there's more images to search the 7 differences before the time is up.

name: Seek and Find Collection 1
description: In Seek & Find Collection 1 there are a bunch of images to search the 7 differences before the time is up.

name: Hinokakera Chaotic Eclipse
description: The fourth major version of Hinokakera, following in the footsteps of its predecessors with its mix of 2D and 3D fighter mechanics. Tweaks have been made to the combat system and character balance, but most importantly, this version features noticeably updated visuals, a replay system and a netplay client integrated to the game itself.

name: Crazy Chicken Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Fishdom: Spooky Splash
description: Sin descripción

name: Thrive
description:
Thrive is a free, open-source game about the evolution of life.
From the lowly tidepools of your home planet, you will rise to cosmic dominance. At every step, powerful creation tools and deep simulation mechanics will aid your species' development.

name: 2 for one 1 Power Pack I Kawasaki Jet Ski / Summer Sports 2: Island Sports Party
description:
A compilation of:

- Kawasaki Jet Ski
- Summer Sports 2: Island Sports Party

name: eCrew Development Program
description: eCrew Development Program is a Nintendo DS game that was created to train McDonald's Japan employees. It was never officially released to the public, and is protected behind a password.

name: Angry Brainless Bovines
description: Angry Brainless Bovines is a simple 'collect the objects' game, in which the player is tasked with collecting pints of milk from a field. It is set up as a simple maze with hedges as walls. The only problem: it has angry cows in it. They also do not take kindly to people in their field and so will attack you whenever possible. Players can use their Xbox 360 Avatar as their character within the game. There is also support for up to four players in competitive gameplay, in which they compete to see who can get the most milk. Co-op can be played on either a single 360 console, or over Xbox Live.

name: Defense of the Oasis
description: One part Minesweeper, one part Civilization. With every click of the mouse your empire grows stronger. But will it be strong enough to withstand the barbarian hordes?

name: Stick Cricket
description: Hit out or get out in the world’s most popular cricket game, Stick Cricket!

name: Rockman 8 FC
description: Rockman 8 FC is a fan-made demake of Mega Man 8 originally released on the Playstation and Sega Saturn in 1996. The project focuses on bringing back the aesthetics of classic 8-Bit games, released on Nintendo Entertainment System. The game has great similarities with the Rockman 7 FC, mainly in gameplay.
